interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK
Review Date: 2021/01/14
Store: HAMUULL
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'}
Review Text: I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin.
Review Title: Great for exfoliating the skin!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Gel Nail Polish Set, Holiday Red Black 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 3.7 x 3.3 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FZ', 'UPC': '738626208554'} I should have read the description on this set better, before ordering as they do not come with a base or top coat which is necessary to get the best longevity out of gel polish.

However I did order the base and top coat from this same brand on Amazon and it works really well. I love the colors in this set and it seems to last about 12-14 days as long as you prep your nails like you should for gel polish.

The color swatch stickers are also nice so you can paint them cure them and apply them to the tops of the bottles and you know which color is which without opening each bottle! Good quality gel polish, but wish it included the base and top coat! Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count SOOAE {'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter, I will update the review once she uses it if we see any irritation or issues with it. She loves these mask so I'm always trying to find some different ones we haven't tried before. Great stocking stuffer! Womens’ Metallic Finish Non Slip Grip 48 Counts 2 Inches Hair Bobby Pins Gray DARONGFENG {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.61 x 2.52 x 0.35 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '788465401296'} Good quality bobby pins that hold really well. I haven't seen the gray color in stores so it was really nice that you could order this color on Amazon. Great bobby pins, Love that you can get them in the gray color! Facial Cleansing Brush made with Ultra Hygienic Soft Silicone 4-PACK HAMUULL {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 1.97 x 0.08 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '779683799654', 'Manufacturer': 'HAMUULL'} I love these silicone face scrubbers, they exfoliate the skin so well and are easy to clean. Just place a dab of your favorite facial cleanser on the scrubber and go to work. It helps with creating a rich lather and exfoliating all of the skin. Great for exfoliating the skin!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** Maintains a strong inclination towards gel nail products, complemented by an increasing interest in skincare tools, particularly those that enhance cleansing and exfoliation. The user continues to explore unique hair accessories, especially in vibrant colors.
- **Quality Focus:** Values high-quality, long-lasting items in nail and skincare products, with a strong commitment to non-toxic and cruelty-free options. The user seeks functional hair accessories that align with a discerning aesthetic.
- **Purchase Behavior:** Engages in thoughtful product sourcing, demonstrating a preference for acquiring items that enhance both personal routines and allow for informed gift-giving. The recent purchase of a facial cleansing tool reflects a growing focus on effective skincare methods.
- **Color Aesthetic:** Enjoys a vibrant color palette and is drawn to unique shades, as evidenced by choices in hair accessories and other beauty products.
- **DIY Enthusiasm:** Exhibits enthusiasm for at-home beauty routines, including nail care and skincare, highlighting a preference for hands-on approaches to beauty.
- **Packaging Preference:** Appreciates effective and practical packaging solutions for beauty products and organization tools.
- **Review Engagement:** Actively leaves detailed feedback based on product experiences, showcasing a desire to share insights and assist others in their purchasing decisions.

Overall, the user balances quality and practicality across beauty, skincare, and hair accessory interests, while embracing a colorful and vibrant aesthetic.
